0:
bootstrapDns: tcp+udp:1.1.1.1
upstream:
  default:
  #- tcp+udp:2001:67c:1be8::53:1
  #- tcp+udp:1.1.1.1
  - tcp-tls:one.one.one.one
  - tcp-tls:dns.google
conditional:
  mapping:
    lan.${HOME_DOMAIN}: tcp+udp:${GATEWAY_ADDRESS}
    skylab.fi: tcp+udp:${GATEWAY_ADDRESS}
    fh: tcp+udp:fd0d:944c:1337:a::1
blocking:
  blackLists:
    ads:
    - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ookangzheng/dbl-oisd-nl/master/dbl.txt
    windowsSpy:
    - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/crazy-max/WindowsSpyBlocker/master/data/hosts/spy.txt
  whiteLists:
    ads:
    - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/anudeepND/whitelist/master/domains/whitelist.txt
    own:
    - https://gist.githubusercontent.com/samip5/447f880e84601b7c44a659faf1c60669/raw/62170401cd2a43533895266a2e7fcafe24a69362/whitelist.txt
  clientGroupsBlock:
    default:
    - ads
    - windowsSpy
clientLookup:
  upstream: tcp+udp:${GATEWAY_ADDRESS}
caching:
  minTime: 1m
  maxTime: 30m
  prefetching: true
  prefetchExpires: 2h
  prefetchThreshold: 5
  prefetchMaxItemsCount: 0
redis:
  address: redis.databases.svc.cluster.local
  database: 10
  required: false
  connectionAttempts: 10
  connectionCooldown: 30s
prometheus:
  enable: true
  path: /metrics
queryLog:
  type: postgresql
  target: "host=192.168.2.2 user=blocky password=${SECRET_BLOCKY_DB_PASSWORD} dbname=blocky sslmode=disable TimeZone=Europe/Helsinki"
  logRetentionDays: 14
httpPort: 4000
if [ $(curl -s https://am.i.mullvad.net/ip) = '${SECRET_EXT_GATEWAY_IP}' ]; then exit 0; else exit $?; fi

/hr/grafana.github.io-helm-charts-loki-s.title: loki helm release
/hr/grafana.github.io-helm-charts-loki-s.name: loki
/hr/grafana.github.io-helm-charts-loki-s.doc: Loki is a log aggregation system that aggregates logs from various sources, such as Kubernetes, and makes them available for search and analysis. It uses a label-based approach to categorize logs, making it easy to query and retrieve relevant logs. The system is designed to be horizontally scalable, highly available, and multi-tenant, making it suitable for use in a variety of environments, including home labs.
